response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,500,000 to me, reflecting its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price tailored to your needs.

Considering its intrinsic worth and your potential appreciation for it, I propose a price of $1,200,000 for you to consider. This offer is designed to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing my return on investment.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
